com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.utilities

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.utilities.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class represents all information about application settings.

    To access any configuration items (for example username attribute):
    String restServerUrl = Configuration.getInstance().getRestServerUrl();
    Configuration.getInstance().setRestServerUrl("http://cpaas.rbbn.com/");

    Since:
    1.0.0

      • setWebSocketIdleTimeout

        public void setWebSocketIdleTimeout(int webSocketIdleTimeout)
        Sets idle timeout for websocket. Value must be in seconds If websocket is idle more than this value, websocket will reconnect again.

        Default value is 30 seconds.

        Parameters:
        webSocketIdleTimeout -
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setServerCertificate

        public void setServerCertificate(java.security.cert.Certificate serverCertificate)
        Sets the server certificate for secure HTTPS. If the server certificate is already uploaded to the device's platform and detected as a trusted certificate, this step can be omitted If a custom server certificate is used, the method must be used X509 is supported as certificate
        Parameters:
        serverCertificate - server certificate to be used in HTTPS connection
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getIceOption

        Default value is ICEOptions.ICE_VANILLA.

        Returns:

      • setIceOption

        public void setIceOption(ICEOptions iceOption)
        Sets ice option. Using this option applications can choose to use TrickleIce or VanillaIce ice options.

        Default value is ICEOptions.ICE_VANILLA.

        Parameters:
        iceOption - ICEOptions ICE_VANILLA or ICE_TRICKLE
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getICECollectionTimeout

        public int getICECollectionTimeout()
        Returns timeout value of ICE Collection.

        Default value is 10 seconds and it means that it waits 10 seconds for ice gathering.

        Returns:
        timeout value for ICE Collection in second.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setICECollectionTimeout

        public void setICECollectionTimeout(int ICECollectionTimeout)
        Sets timeout value of ICE Collection.

        Default value is 10 seconds and it means that it waits 10 seconds for ice gathering. If set to 0, it means that SDK will wait until ice gathering completion.

        Parameters:
        ICECollectionTimeout - timeout value for ICE Collection in second.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getDtmfToneDuration

        public int getDtmfToneDuration()
        Returns duration value of DTMF tones im ms.

        Default value is 600 milliseconds. Value can be between 70 and 6000.

        Returns:
        duration value for DTMF tone in ms.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setDtmfToneDuration

        public void setDtmfToneDuration(int dtmfToneDuration)

        Default value is 600 milliseconds. Value can be between 70 and 6000.

        Parameters:
        dtmfToneDuration - duration value for DTMF tone in ms.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getDefaultCameraMode

        public int getDefaultCameraMode()
        Returns the default camera mode. Default mode is front camera.

        0 CameraInfo.CAMERA_FACING_BACK; 1 CameraInfo.CAMERA_FACING_FRONT;

        Returns:
        int

      • getAudioCodecConfiguration

        public AudioCodecConfiguration getAudioCodecConfiguration()
        Gets the audio codec configurations.

        Default value is not set, so it will use default value of WebRTC.

        Returns:
        AudioCodecConfiguration
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setAudioCodecConfiguration

        public void setAudioCodecConfiguration(AudioCodecConfiguration audioCodecConfiguration)
        Sets the Audio Codec configurations.

        Default value is not set, so it will use default value of WebRTC.

        Warning: This is advanced usage if you don't have expertise on Opus audio codec don't use it.

        Parameters:
        audioCodecConfiguration - AudioCodecConfiguration object which will contains all Opus audio codec configurations.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getPreferredCodecSet

        public CodecSet getPreferredCodecSet()
        Returns preferred Codec Set.

        Default value is not set, so it will use default value of WebRTC.

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setPreferredCodecSet

        public void setPreferredCodecSet(CodecSet preferredCodecSet)
        Sets preferred CodecSet for modified sdp creation.

        Default value is not set, so it will use default value of WebRTC.

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getRESTUrl

        public java.lang.String getRESTUrl()
        Creates and returns the Rest Url with proper protocol prefix (http or https).
        Returns:
        Rest Url

      • getNotificationUrl

        public java.lang.String getNotificationUrl()
        This method returns the communication url.
        Returns:
        notificationUrl String

      • setReceiveBandwidthLimit

        public void setReceiveBandwidthLimit(CallReceiveBandwidthLimit receiveBandwidthLimit)
        Sets the bandwidth limit for all outgoing calls to be created and incoming calls to be received. This bandwidth limit will take effect on received audio/video stream by defining the max bitrate received for local peer If not set, WebRTC values are used.
        Parameters:
        receiveBandwidthLimit - set Bandwidth for receiver side of the audio and video call
        Since:
        1.7.0

      • getReceiveBandwidthSetting

        public CallReceiveBandwidthLimit getReceiveBandwidthSetting()
        Gets the bandwidth limit for all outgoing calls to be created and incoming calls to be received. This bandwidth limit will take effect on received audio/video stream by defining the max bitrate received for local peer There is no default value.
        Since:
        1.7.0

      • setForceDisableMediaOnHold

        public void setForceDisableMediaOnHold(boolean value)
        Forces to disable media transfer when media on hold is active. It helps to fix some MOH issues on PSTN calls Default value is false.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getForceDisableMediaOnHold

        public boolean getForceDisableMediaOnHold()
        Gets the forceDisableMediaOnHold state. This value forces to disable media transfer when media on hold is active. It helps to fix some MOH issues on PSTN calls. Default value is false.
        Returns:
        forceDisableMediaOnHold boolean

      • getRingingFeedbackOption

        public RingingFeedbackOptions getRingingFeedbackOption()
        Gets ringingFeedbackOption Default value is CLIENT,
        Returns:
        RingingFeedbackOptions
        Since:
        2.15.0

      • setRingingFeedbackOption

        public void setRingingFeedbackOption(RingingFeedbackOptions ringingFeedbackOption)
        NONE --> There will be no ringing feedback. CLIENT --> Client based ringing feedback. Default value is CLIENT.
        Parameters:
        ringingFeedbackOption - NONE or CLIENT.
        Since:
        2.15.0
